description:
After playing the descending arpeggio at bar 34, the 10th fret D string is played with the pinky; it's then easier to keep hand in same position and use index finger to play 6th fret D rather than shift hand and play 11th fret A string with pinky to follow up with 10th fret ring finger and 8th fret index. Also means next bar, 35 maintains same hand position from bar 34.
(via editor)
title: Giant Steps
